tools.name: AnoMark
tools.description: Statistical learning algorithm to create a model on the command lines of the Process Creation events on Windows, in order to detect anomalies in future events

tools.name: BlueHound
tools.description: Helps blue teams pinpoint the security issues that actually matter by combining information about user permissions, network access and unpatched vulnerabilities, to reveal the paths attackers would take if they were inside the network

tools.name: DARKSURGEON
tools.description: Windows project to empower incident response, digital forensics, malware analysis, and network defense with HashiCorp Packer and Vagrant

tools.name: Deming
tools.description: Management tool for the information security management system (ISMS); manage, plan, track and report the effectiveness of security controls

tools.name: DenyLocker
tools.description: Make the creation and maintenance of Applocker rules in blacklist mode easy and practical

tools.name: driftctl
tools.description: Measures infrastructure as code coverage, and tracks infrastructure drift

tools.name: FalconHound
tools.description: Plug BloodHound with a SIEM or other log aggregation

tools.name: GraphQL Armor
tools.description: GraphQL security layer for Apollo and Yoga / Envelop servers

tools.name: Have I Been Squatted? - Twistr
tools.description: Generate all permutations of a domain which are enriched for typosquatting detection

tools.name: Imagemagick Security Policy Evaluator
tools.description: Allows developers and security experts to check if an Imagemagick XML Security Policy is hardened against a wide set of malicious attacks

tools.name: Mercator
tools.description: Web application to manage the mapping of an information system as described in the Mapping The Information System Guide of the ANSSI

tools.name: Pandora
tools.description: Analysis framework that discovers if a file is suspicious and conveniently show the results

tools.name: Pandora-box
tools.description: Detect and remove malware from USB disks (based on Pandora)

tools.name: usbsas
tools.description: Tool and framework for securely reading untrusted USB mass storage devices

tools.name: Wazuh
tools.description: Security monitoring solution for threat detection, integrity monitoring, incident response and compliance; unified XDR and SIEM protection for endpoints and cloud workloads
